remarks: Indirect strong induction on the cardinality of a finite or numerable set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.)
statement:
indcardi.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
indcardi.b $e |- ( ph -> T e. dom card ) $.
indcardi.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ R ~<_ T /\ A. y ( S ~< R -> ch ) ) -> ps ) $.
indcardi.d $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
indcardi.e $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
indcardi.f $e |- ( x = y -> R = S ) $.
indcardi.g $e |- ( x = A -> R = T ) $.
indcardi $p |- ( ph -> th ) $.
$d A x $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
$d T x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
$d th x $.
